Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

::Grimlock::
   
  Grimlock: Me Grimlock like Airtankers. Them strong and funny.
   
  ::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder listened to Dinobot and then to the trooper that came up to them. He decided that he could meet with Jotunn and the Airtankers while they waited to get through to Perseus.
   
  Elder: I'll meet with them now. I imagine they are still outside over seeing the damage?
   
  Trooper: At one of the shuttle ports. You'll know which one when you see it. Grimlock crashed a shuttle into it.
   
  Elder looks down, shaking his head.
   
  Elder: Oh boy. Dinobot, perhaps you should come to this meeting. I'm sure we'll listen to your plan and consider it. Windlord, you inform Lord Perseus of out current plan. I'll be along shortly.
   
  Elder and the trooper head for the shuttle port.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          OOC: If you'd like to bring in some more characters into the Dragon
Corps (a multi faction strike force), you're welcome (and very
encouraged =) ) to do so.

Still in beast mode, Jotunn came hurrying out as he heard the
commotion outside.

Jotunn: Oh, Grimlock. I see you're back. I didn't think it'd be so
soon, but I'm glad it is.

In the wreckage, the Airtankers were grumbling and muttering. Everyone
of them, that is, except Skysowrd.

Skysword: I TOLD YOU! WE'RE FLYERS! fLYERS FLY ON THEIR OWN! WE DON'T
GET SPECIAL TREATMENTS OR ANY FOOLISHNESS LIKE THAT! I'M A BIG BOY! I
CAN DO IT ON MY OWN!!!!

Jotunn nodded approvingly. This would do quite well. He turned to a
nearby trooper.

Jotunn: Please go tell Lord Elder that I'll need him here for a
strategic meeting with the Airtankers as soon as he can spare some time.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Grimlock::
> 
> A side panel on the shuttle is pushed off as fire and rescue crews
crawl over the area. Grimlock steps out of the shuttle in his T-Rex mode.
> 
> Grimlock: Ok so me Grimlock don't fly well... Bring guests for
Jotunn though.
